product_name: REI Toddlers' Grip-N-Gulp Water Bottle - 12 fl. oz.
long_description: The REI Grip n' Gulp(TM) bottle is rugged enough for the most challenging outdoor adventures but sized specifically for rough-and-tumble toddlers! Offers the same durability, quality and taste-free storage as a standard polycarbonate bottle but sized small for little hands to hold. Same size opening as the 32 oz. wide-mouth bottle, so it will accommodate ice cubes, a loop top or sipper insert and stay easy to clean. Rigid polycarbonate material won't absorb tastes, odors or residue; threading on cup and lid is engineered to prevent spills. Bottle, lid, and removable sipper valve are all top rack dishwasher safe; remove Sipper valve(TM) before each cleaning and replace before use. Rubberized lid and smooth plastic mouthpiece make drinking comfortable; lid loop can be clipped to backpack, diaper bag, or stroller. Side indentions make bottle easier for small hands to grasp. Hand wash in warm water with a mild dishwashing detergent.
short_description: The REI Grip n' Gulp(TM) bottle is rugged enough for the most challenging outdoor adventures but sized specifically for rough-and-tumble toddlers!
